talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_00>What's that? You really saw this at
Lakeside Stable?!

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Dondons, huh? I guess the rumors about
a beast were way off the mark, then.

Heh, I'd be lying if I said I wasn't a little
sad. The rumors about the beast were a
lot to live up to.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>On the bright side, I now know just a bit
more about the world. Thanks for sharing
that info with me!
Goodbye_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think><sp:5:0:0>Hm. I wonder what is going on with
those people in their underpants
outside...
It's really strange, but I don't want to ask
what they're doing. That just seems like
it would be incredibly awkward.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Notice_00>Interested in that picture, traveler? It's
actually the tracks of a new species called
Dondon, and...
Wait a minute...


<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_00>It's you! I didn't even realize who I was
talking to.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I've just been so excited about the
Dondon after hearing about it. I can't help
but bring it up with everyone.
<snd:TalkPositive_01>I mean, I'm not just bringing it up out of
the blue or anything.

I only mention it to people who check
out the picture.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>But... Well, you're the one who told me
about it in the first place, so I wouldn't be
telling you anything new, huh?
<sp:0:2:2:5000>So embarrassing.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Goodbye_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Those people who were outside in their
underpants seem to have vanished.

Maybe it's finally time I try to visit the
Lucky Clover Gazette and see what
working there is like!
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>You saw one in person, didn't you? And
you're still interested in the tracks a
Dondon leaves? You must really be a fan!
I still can't believe it was around
Lakeside Stable...

I doubt I'll find any wandering around
here, no matter how hard I search...
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_01>Say, traveler... Excuse my interruption,
but you seem interested in that picture.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>It is an unusual sight, isn't it?
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy_00>That is, in fact, a picture of the tracks of
the <clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff>!

Rumors about that creature just keep
traveling from stable to stable, and from
person to person.
You might well find someone at any
stable spreading these rumors.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Are you interested in that picture
after all?

<sp:3:0:2:0001>It's apparently the footprint of that
<clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff>.
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I've even done a little searching around
the Eldin region. I was hoping I'd be the
one to discover what this beast is.
But I didn't find anything. It must not be
around here.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>The idea of anything unknown—or that's
yet to be identified—makes me excited.
Like a new species!
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Places to be, I imagine! Safe journey to
you, traveler.
Goodbye_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy>It's really wonderful to be able to learn
about the world just by hanging around in
a place like this.
Lucky Clover Gazette is a big part of that
too! Maybe someday I'll go visit them and
see what working there is like.
